title: Process Page
description: This challenge is to practice responsive design with HTML and CSS skills. The challenge is to create a process page that challenges you to work with different break-points.

userStories.content: Create a process page that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create the basic structure.
Add heading, descriptions, icons,.. according to the design.
Add dashed lines to separate different sections.
Use CSS to style the card.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
